description.value:
The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, and the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, and the lizard can’t bite another target.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not &Reference[grappled]{grappled} by the lizard. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save str 15 format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is &Reference[blinded]{blinded} and &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes [[/damage 3d6 type=acid average=true]] damage at the start of each of the lizard’s turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time.

If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer &Reference[restrained]{restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].
